scripts.update-dependencies: PREFIX="decaf-ts"; npm ls | grep "$PREFIX" | awk -F/ '{print $NF}' | sed 's/@.*//' | xargs -I package npm update @"$PREFIX"/package
scripts.set-git-auth: git config url."https://api:$(cat .token)@github.com/".insteadOf "https://github.com/" && git config url."https://ssh:$(cat .token)@github.com/".insteadOf "ssh://git@github.com/" && git config url."https://git:$(cat .token)@github.com/".insteadOf "git@github.com:"
scripts.reset: rm -rf * && git checkout . && git pull && npm run do-install
scripts.test:dist: TEST_TARGET=lib npm run test:all && TEST_TARGET=dist npm run test:all
scripts.prepare-pr: npm run lint-fix && npm run build:prod && npm run coverage && npm run docs
scripts.repo:init:
codex exec "$(cat ./.codex/prompts/repo-setup.md)
base_path is `./`, initialize the repository" -s workspace-write
scripts.repo:tests:
codex exec "$(cat ./.codex/prompts/bulk-tests.md)
base_path is ./ and coverage is 95%" -s workspace-write
scripts.repo:pr: npm run repo:doc && npm run repo:tests && npm run repo:readme
scripts.drawings: for FILE in workdocs/drawings/*.drawio; do echo "converting $FILE to image..." && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/data rlespinasse/drawio-export --format png $FILE; done && cp -rf workdocs/drawings/export/* workdocs/resources/
scripts.uml: cd workdocs/uml && for FILE in ./*.puml; do docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/work -w /work miy4/plantuml -DPLANTUML_LIMIT_SIZE=8192 -tpng $FILE; done && cd ../.. && cp -fr workdocs/uml/*.png workdocs/resources/
scripts.docs: npx rimraf ./docs && mkdir docs && npx build-scripts --docs
scripts.docker:build-base: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --secret id=TOKEN,src=$PWD/.npmtoken -t ghcr.io/decaf-ts/ts-workspace:base-$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version') -t ghcr.io/decaf-ts/ts-workspace:base-${VERSION:-latest} -f ./Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:publish-base: docker push ghcr.io/decaf-ts/ts-workspace:base-$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version') && docker push ghcr.io/decaf-ts/ts-workspace:base-${VERSION:-latest}
